description:
One of the types of software that’s important for a web developer is the web framework. We explore the finest F# web frameworks.

The post 9 Top Free and Open Source F# Web Frameworks appeared first on Linux Today.
title: 9 Top Free and Open Source F# Web Frameworks

description:
Great news! Linux has reached a new milestone in desktop market share. As of July 2024, Linux has achieved a 4.45% market share for desktop operating systems worldwide.

The post Linux Continues to Grow: 4.45% Desktop Market Share in July 2024 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Linux Continues to Grow: 4.45% Desktop Market Share in July 2024

description:
pip is a package manager for Python that helps you install and manage additional libraries and dependencies that are not included in the standard library. It’s secure and widely used by many developers to manage Python packages and projects. This guide will show you how to install pip on Ubuntu 24.04 in a few steps.

The post How to Install pip on Ubuntu 24.04 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install pip on Ubuntu 24.04

description:
In this article, you will learn how to find similarities and differences between two files in Linux with practical examples from the CLI and GUI methods.

The post How to Find Uniqueness in Two Files in Linux appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Find Uniqueness in Two Files in Linux

description:
Learn how to use the chattr command on Linux, as well as the various options, operators, and file attributes you can use.

The post How to Use Chattr Command in Linux (for Beginners) appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Use Chattr Command in Linux (for Beginners)

description:
CockroachDB announces strategic licensing overhaul, shifting away from open source and focusing on a single Enterprise solution.

The post CockroachDB: Core Discontinued as Focus Shifts to Enterprise Solutions appeared first on Linux Today.
title: CockroachDB: Core Discontinued as Focus Shifts to Enterprise Solutions

description:
MiniOS 3.3.4 updates: Now build on 3.3.x, enhanced installer, supports MMC, exFAT, and Linux kernel 6.1.90.

The post MiniOS 3.3.4 Released, Here’s What’s New and Improved appeared first on Linux Today.
title: MiniOS 3.3.4 Released, Here’s What’s New and Improved

description:
Archinstall 2.8.2 is the second maintenance update in the Archinstall 2.8 series and it’s here to optimize the mirror listing by using /mirrors/status/json/ instead of /mirrorlist/, which speeds up the loading of mirrors and downloading during installation.

The post Archinstall 2.8.2 Arch Linux Installer Speeds Up Mirror Loading and Download appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Archinstall 2.8.2 Arch Linux Installer Speeds Up Mirror Loading and Download

description:
Labwc 0.8 wlroots-based window-stacking compositor for Wayland rolls out with major updates to wlroots 0.18.

The post Labwc 0.8 Wayland Compositor Released appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Labwc 0.8 Wayland Compositor Released
